longBusinessSummary: DB (International) Stock Brokers Limited provides stock broking and depository participant services of CDSL primarily in India. It offers non-resident Indian services, such as equity and derivatives trading; mutual fund and initial public offering investment; and procurement of permanent account number cards and RBI permissions. The company also engages in currency and commodity broking; margin trading; provision of depository and portfolio management services; distribution of mutual funds. DB (International) Stock Brokers Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
